definition: ultimately/in the final analysis/after all/when all is said and done
surname Gui

to return/to go back to/to give back to/(of a responsibility) to be taken care of by/to belong to/to gather together/(used between two identical verbs) despite/to marry (of a woman) (old)/division on the abacus with a one-digit divisor
root/basis/classifier for long slender objects, e.g. cigarettes, guitar strings/CL:條|条[tiao2]/radical (chemistry)
knot/sturdy/bond/to tie/to bind/to check out (of a hotel)
(of a plant) to produce (fruit or seeds)/Taiwan pr. [jie2]
variant of 蒂[di4]
stem (of fruit)

sentences.english: But fiscal stimulus by definition is temporary.
sentences.chinese: 然而财政刺激归根结蒂只是暂时性的。

sentences.english: In the fInal analysis, the strength In russia was on the side of the Soviets of Workers, Peasants and Soldiers.
sentences.chinese: 归根结蒂，俄国的力量是在工农兵苏维埃这方面。

sentences.english: Love is, above all, the gift of oneself. (Jean Bnouilh)
sentences.chinese: 归根结蒂，爱情是你本身的天赋。

sentences.english: Love is, above all, the gift of oneself. (Jean Anouilh)
sentences.chinese: 归根结蒂，一爱一情是你自己的天赋。

sentences.english: That is to say, in the last analysis, it serves the economic base .
sentences.chinese: 这就是说，归根结蒂，它是为经济基础服务的。

sentences.english: In a word, it is a matter of the construction of the library legal system.
sentences.chinese: 但归根结蒂，是图书馆的法制建设问题。

sentences.english: So he can be in love, after all.
sentences.chinese: 所以，归根结蒂，他可能是在恋爱了。

sentences.english: Love is, above all, the gift of oneself. (Jean Anouilh)
sentences.chinese: 归根结蒂，是自身的天赋。

definition: after all/in the final analysis/ultimately
to trace something to its source (idiom)
same as 總而言之|总而言之[zong3 er2 yan2 zhi1]
one word says it all (idiom, from Analects); to cut a long story short/in a nutshell
motivation/moving force/underlying force/agent
determinism
lit. one body two sides (idiom)/fig. a situation with two sides to it
place of interest/a place one has one's eye on
in simple terms/to put things simply/briefly
ideology
motive force/prime mover/first cause/agent
essence/nature/innate character/intrinsic quality
utilitarianism
consciousness
to reverse cause and effect/to put the horse before the cart
thought/thinking/idea/ideology/CL:個|个[ge4]
